Reviews.Title: Strong Material
Reviews.Author: edward hernandez
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this Item due to the image quality and fidelity. It's easy to handle and the connectors are very strong.

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
All-in-one CCTV video and power cable
Pre-Made 66 feet video/power cables in white
BNC video connector & 2.1mm power cable
BNC connectors and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 66ft Feet Video Power BNC RCA Cable for CCTV DVR Home Security Cameras CBV66W MBJ
